name: MAN Truck & Bus SE
membership: MAN ist u.a. Mitglied bei: Verband der europäischen Automobilhersteller (ACEA), Forum for the Automobile and Society (FAS), Bundesverband der Deutschen Industrie  (BDI), Verband der Autombilindustrie (VDA), Verband Deutscher Maschinen- und Anlagenbau (VDMA).
goal: MAN Truck & Bus is one of Europe’s leading manufacturers of commercial vehicles and has production facilities in three European countries, Russia, South Africa and Turkey. Its product portfolio comprises vans, trucks, buses, and diesel and gas engines, as well as passenger and freight transportation services.
interests: Business and Industry, Climate Action, Communication, Competition, Consumers, Customs, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, External Relations, Research and innovation, Single market, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives:
- Revision RL 96/53 (Weights & Dimensions)
- CO2 Heavy Duty Vehicles
- Connected and automated driving
- FTA Verhandlungen der EU Kommission
- Energiestrategien der EU-Kommission
- General Safety Regulation
